game.title: Chronicles of Astralis
game.synopsis: Chronicles of Astralis is a fantasy adventure game where the player takes on the role of an astronaut, stranded and alone on a mysterious alien planet. Their mission is to survive, explore and uncover the secrets of the ancient, advanced civilization that once lived here.
game.beginning: Game begins with protagonist's spaceship malfunctioning and crash-landing onto the alien planet. Lost and alone, the player has to gather resources to survive while dealing with the immediate effects of the crash.
game.ending: In the climax, the player manages to unearth the technology that drove the alien civilization and uses it to send an SOS back to their home planet. A rescue ship arrives, and the game ends with the player boarding the rescue ship, leaving the alien planet behind.
